content.rendered:
Collidoscope Berlin is all about diversity, difference, and positive discourse – we look forward to your questions, concerns, ideas, or potential stories! On an individual basis, we will also consider writing or posting about your organization or event if its content is relevant to our project and its themes.

For more information, please contact us at collidoscopeberlin@gmail.com.

For information about sharing and re-posting our content, please read our Imprint.
